thread.title: Frank B. Customer
thread.title_full: Apricot Power reviewed by Frank B. Customer

author: Frank B. Customer
title: Frank B. Customer
text: I started taking Apricot seeds when I was diagnosed with prostate cancer. Took this along with traditional treatment and am very pleased. You get use to the taste which gets a little bitter and look forward to snacking on these throughout the day! I can't confirm that taking this product is the reason for the change in my Kidney disease and there is nothing published in the literature that I have researched, but I have noticed a positive change and my Nephrologist (who has also researched Apricot Seed affect on kidney disease ) can't believe the change! With cautious optimism, I'll keep you posted when I order again!
